summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6565 for the improvement of West Lynn Place from 26th Ave. West to 24th Ave. West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 101495, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
